<h1 id="firstHeading" class="firstHeading" lang="en" itemprop="name">Level 40 stats table</h1>				<div id="bodyContent" class="mw-body-content">
					<div id="siteSub" class="noprint">From Fire Emblem Heroes Wiki</div>					<div id="contentSub"></div>
										<div id="jump-to-nav" class="mw-jump">
						Jump to:						<a href="#mw-head">navigation</a>, 						<a href="#p-search">search</a>
					</div>
					<div id="mw-content-text" lang="en" dir="ltr" class="mw-content-ltr"><div class="mw-parser-output"><ul><li>This table shows the 5<img alt="â˜…" src="https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/feheroes_gamepedia_en/thumb/4/4e/Icon_Rarity_5.png/20px-Icon_Rarity_5.png?version=1a5f1ac3219813061c33a00f539ec72e" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" srcset="https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/feheroes_gamepedia_en/thumb/4/4e/Icon_Rarity_5.png/30px-Icon_Rarity_5.png?version=1a5f1ac3219813061c33a00f539ec72e 1.5x, https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/feheroes_gamepedia_en/thumb/4/4e/Icon_Rarity_5.png/40px-Icon_Rarity_5.png?version=1a5f1ac3219813061c33a00f539ec72e 2x" /> <b>average</b> max level base stat values for each hero. It does not include <a href="/Stat_Growth" class="mw-redirect" title="Stat Growth">stat variance</a>. Also see <a href="/Level_40_unrounded_stats_table" title="Level 40 unrounded stats table">Level 40 unrounded stats table</a> for what these stats would look like without rounding.</li>
<li>Stat values in this table <b>do not include</b> weapon or passive stats.</li>
<li>When sorting the table, any rows with identical values will keep their relative order from before the last sorting operation.</li>
<li>For more specialized charts, see <a href="/Specialized_Charts" class="mw-redirect" title="Specialized Charts">here</a>.</li></ul>

</p>

			<h3 id="p-Game_modes-label">Game modes</h3>
